tags.name: v1/social/activities
tags.description: Managing activities together with comments and likes

tags.name: v1/social/groupSpaceBindings
tags.description: API  to manage the binding between a space and an organization group

tags.name: v1/social/favorites
tags.description: Managing favorites for any type of data

tags.name: v1/social/spaces
tags.description: Operations on spaces with their activities and users

tags.name: v1/social/spacesMemberships
tags.description: Managing memberships of users in a space

tags.name: v1/social/tags
tags.description: Managing tags for any type of data

tags.name: v1/social/users
tags.description: Operations on users with their activities, connections and spaces

get.summary: Gets activities of a specific user
get.description:
This returns an activity in the list in the following cases:
  • this is a user activity and the owner of the activity isthe authenticated user or one of his connections
  • this is a space activity and the authenticated user is a member of the space

parameters.name: beforeTime
parameters.description: offset time to use for searching newer activities until a time identified using format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss

parameters.name: afterTime
parameters.description: offset time to use for searching newer activities since a time identified using format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss

parameters.name: returnSize
parameters.description: Returning the number of activities or not

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: comments or likes

parameters.name: streamType
parameters.description: Activity stream type. Possible values: ALL_STREAM, USER_STREAM, USER_FAVORITE_STREAM, MANAGE_SPACES_STREAM, FAVORITE_SPACES_STREAM.

post.summary: Posts an activity to a specific space
post.description: This posts the activity if the authenticated user is a member of the space or a spaces super manager.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: comments or likes

requestBody.description: Activity object to be created

get.summary: Search activities using a query
get.description: This returns a list of activities found by using search term

parameters.name: favorites
parameters.description: Whether to search in favorites only or not

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tag names used to search activities

get.summary: Gets a specific activity by id
get.description:
This returns the activity in the following cases:
  • this is a user activity and the owner of the activity is the authenticated user or one of his connections
  • this is a space activity and the authenticated user is a member of the space
  • the authenticated user is the super user

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: comments or likes

put.summary: Updates a specific activity by id
put.description:
This updates the activity in the following cases:
  • this is a user activity and the owner of the activity is the authenticated user
  • the authenticated user is the super user

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: comments or likes

requestBody.description:
Activity object to be updated, ex:
{
"title" : "My activity"
}

delete.summary: Deletes a specific activity by id
delete.description:
This deletes the activity in the following cases:
  • this is a user activity and the owner of the activity is the authenticated user
  • the authenticated user is the super user

parameters.name: hide
parameters.description: Whether to just hide the activity or effectively delete it from database

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource if any

This creates the space membership in the following cases:

  • the authenticated user is a manager of the space
  • the authenticated user is a spaces super manager

parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource if any

Space membership object to be created, ex:
{
"role": "manager",
"user": "john",
"space": "my space"
}

get.summary: Gets a specific space membership by id
get.description:
This returns the space membership in the following cases:
  • the user of the space membership is the authenticated user
  • the authenticated user is a manager of the space
  • the authenticated user is a spaces super manager

parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource if any

500.description: Internal server error due to data encoding

put.summary: Updates a specific space membership by id
put.description:
This updates the space membership in the following cases:
  • the user of the space membership is the authenticated user but he cannot update his own membership to "approved" for a space with a "validation" subscription
  • the authenticated user is a manager of the space
  • the authenticated user is a spaces super manager
  • the user of the space membership is the authenticated user, he can update his own membership to "approved" or "ignored" for a space with a "closed" subscription

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Space membership id which is in format spaceName:userName:role, ex: my_space:root:manager

get.summary: Find list of tags using a search term
get.description: Returns list of tags

get.summary: Gets all users
get.description: Using the query param "q" to filter the target users, ex: "q=jo*" returns all the users beginning by "jo".Using the query param "status" to filter the target users, ex: "status=online*" returns the visible online users.Using the query params "status" and "spaceId" together to filter the target users, ex: "status=online*" and "spaceId=1*" returns the visible online users who are member of space with id=1.The params "status" and "spaceId" cannot be used with "q" param since it will falsify the "limit" param which is 20 by default. If these 3 parameters are used together, the parameter "q" will be ignored

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: User name information to filter, ex: user name, last name, first name or full name

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: User status to filter online users, ex: online

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: User type to filter, ex: internal, external

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Space id to filter only its members, ex: 1

parameters.name: enrollmentStatus
parameters.description: Enrollment status, ex: enrolled, not enrolled, no possible enrollment

parameters.name: returnSize
parameters.description: Returning the number of users found or not

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource if any

500.description: Internal server error due to data encoding

post.description: This creates the user if the authenticated user is in the /platform/administrators group.

{
"username": "john",

"email": "john@exoplatform.com",
"firstname": "John",
"lastname": "Smith"

  • this is a user activity and the owner of the activity is the authenticated user or one of his connections
  • this is a space activity and the authenticated user is a member of the space

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Activity stream type, ex: owner, connections, spaces or all

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Base time to load older activities (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Base time to load newer activities (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: returnSize
parameters.description: Returning the number of activities or not

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: comments or likes

post.summary: Creates an activity by a specific user
post.description: This creates the activity if the given user is the authenticated user.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: comments or likes

requestBody.description:
Activity object to be created, in which the title of activity is required, ex:
{"title": "act4 posted"}

get.summary: Gets a specific user avatar by username
get.description: The user avatar will be returned only if there is a currently authenticated user or an anonymous user that has a valid token generated by a Server encryption key.

parameters.name: lastModified
parameters.description: The value of lastModified parameter will determine whether the query should be cached by browser or not. If not set, no 'expires HTTP Header will be sent'

parameters.name: r
parameters.description: A mandatory valid token that is used to authorize anonymous request

500.description: Internal server error due to data encoding

get.summary: Gets a specific user banner by username
get.description: The user avatar will be returned only if there is a currently authenticated user or an anonymous user that has a valid token generated by a Server encryption key.

parameters.name: lastModified
parameters.description: The value of lastModified parameter will determine whether the query should be cached by browser or not. If not set, no 'expires HTTP Header will be sent'

parameters.name: r
parameters.description: A mandatory valid token that is used to authorize anonymous request

500.description: Internal server error due to data encoding

get.summary: Gets connections of a specific user
get.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: User name information to filter, ex: user name, last name, first name or full name

parameters.name: returnSize
parameters.description: Returning the number of connections or not

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource if any

patch.summary: Update set of properties in user profile
patch.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

requestBody.description: User profile attributes map

204.description: Request fulfilled but not content returned

500.description: Internal server error due to data encoding

get.summary: Gets spaces of a specific user
get.description:
This returns a list of spaces in the following cases:
  • the given user is the authenticated user
  • the authenticated user is in the group /platform/administrators

parameters.name: returnSize
parameters.description: Returning the number of spaces or not

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: members or managers

get.summary: Gets commons spaces of current user
get.description:
This returns a list of commons spaces in the following cases:
  • the given user is the authenticated user
  • the authenticated user is in the group /platform/administrators

parameters.name: returnSize
parameters.description: Returning the number of spaces or not

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: members or managers

get.summary: Gets all user relationships
get.description:
This returns a list of relationships in the following cases:
  • if the query param "user" is not defined: returns the relationships of the authenticated user
  • if the "user" is defined and the authenticated user is not an administrator: returns the relationships of the authenticated user
  • if the "user" is defined and the authenticated user is an administrator: returns the relationships of the defined user
  • if the "others" is defined: returns the relationships between the user and the users defined in "others" only

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specific status of relationships: pending, confirmed or all

parameters.name: others
parameters.description: Usernames of the others users to get relationships with the given user

parameters.name: returnSize
parameters.description: Returning the number of relationships or not

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: sender or receiver

put.summary: Updates a specific relationship of two users. One of them must be the current user.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: sender or receiver

requestBody.description: Relationship object to be updated

post.summary: Creates a relationship between two specific users
post.description:
This creates the relationship in the following cases:
  • the sender or the receiver of the user relationship is the authenticated user
  • the authenticated user is in the group /platform/administrators

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Asking for a full representation of a specific subresource, ex: sender or receiver

requestBody.description:
Relationship object to be created, required fields:
sender - user name of the sender,
receiver - user name of the receiver,
status - pending or confirmed

get.summary: Gets a specific relationship of user by id

  • the authenticated user is in the group /platform/administrators

parameters.name: expand

This deletes the relationship in the following cases:
  • the sender or the receiver of the user relationship is the authenticated user
  • the authenticated user is in the group /platform/administrators
